title: JOB for specifying break during acquisition
description: The JOBs module in NIS-Elements is a versitile software for generating bespoke imaging experiments. Here we show how to include a user specified break in the acquisition so that solutions can be added manually to the sample. The user then presses Ok for the aquisition to continue.

title: Multi-colour STORM/SMLM experiments
description: Multi-colour STORM experiments are not trivial. Using anything other than Alexa 647 is difficult, and different dyes require careful consideration to select appropriate fluorophores and buffer conditions.

title: Alternatives to the Ti/Ti2 pad in NIS Elements
description: The Ti2 pad can take up a lot of screen are in NIS-Elements, and users generally only use it to select the objective and turn on the perfect focus system. Here we show an alternative that provides more useful information to the user, and takes up less screen space.
